resources.string: The app, nor its creator or anyone associated with it, shall be held responsible for any damage or whatsoever, caused, directly or indirectly, by its usage.
The same login pattern must be set during the import and export operations, failing which will result in data corruption.
Please export the stored records as a precautionary measure so that the data can be restored if anything goes wrong when changing the pattern.

Mini Password Manager is a very minimalistic password manager app for android that uses AES-128 encryption algorithm to encrypt all the data stored. The app does not offer multi-platform or synchronization support. All the data are stored locally in encrypted format for which the key is generated based on the login pattern set. It is intended only for personal usage.
For submitting bug reports, suggestions, feedback and queries, please mail the developer at karthikmlore@outlook.com
